name: MKDirections
desc: A utility object that computes directions and travel-time information based on the route information you provide.

items.name: init(request: MKDirections.Request)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a directions object using the specified request.

items.name: class MKDirections.Request
items.desc: The start and end points of a route, along with the planned mode of transportation.

items.name: func calculate(completionHandler: MKDirections.DirectionsHandler)
items.desc: Begins calculating the requested route information asynchronously.

items.name: typealias MKDirections.DirectionsHandler
items.desc: The block to use for processing the requested route information.

items.name: class MKDirections.Response
items.desc: The route information returned by Apple servers in response to one of your requests for directions.

items.name: func calculateETA(completionHandler: MKDirections.ETAHandler)
items.desc: Begins calculating the requested travel-time information asynchronously.

items.name: typealias MKDirections.ETAHandler
items.desc: The block to use for processing travel-time information.

items.name: class MKDirections.ETAResponse
items.desc: The travel-time information returned by Apple servers.

items.name: var isCalculating: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether a request is currently in process.
